config.enabled.name: Show chest preview
config.range.name: Show preview range
config.range.tooltip: 0 or -1 for infite range. The amount of tiles away from the player where a preview should be shown.
config.size.name: Preview menu UI size
config.connector.name: Show chest to preview connector
config.enablekey.name: Use keyboard key to show preview
config.key.name: Key to press
config.key.tooltip: Only works if the avobe option is checked
config.enablemouse.name: Use mouse button to show preview
config.mouse.name: Mouse button to press
config.mouse.tooltip: Only works if the avobe option is checked
